amendment.description: Amendment increases funding in the bill by $95.8 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 1 printed in H. Rept. 106-685 to increase total funding in the bill by $95.8 million for various House of Representatives, Capitol Police, CBO, Architect, CRS, GPO, and GAO accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
